document.full_text: disney's espn network on tuesday yanked its poker-related ads and programing as federal agents continued to investigate money laundering and fraud charges against online gambling sites that sponsor the network.
document.title: espn network pulls poker ads after online gambling scandal
lines_and_colors: disney's espn network on tuesday yanked its poker-related ads and programing as federal agents continued to investigate money laundering and fraud charges against online gambling sites that sponsor the network.
